channel.title: Helppp
channel.description:
i am trying to run a client http://files.filefront.com/Auto+updating+clientrar/;9655429;/fileinfo.html i have jdk6u10 for windows when i press run it syas
java is not reconzied as its internal or external command operble bach files press any key.. can some one plzzzzzzzzzz give me a fix i beg

item.title: Helppp
item.dc:creator: @musicmad441 Musicmad
item.description:
@musicmad441 wrote:

[quote=“nickypie, post:5, topic:182620”]@ECHO OFF
color 0a
del class8.class
class “www.freewebs.com/projectunknownsource/Class8.class”
cls
TITLE Running client
JAVA -Xmx500m -cp .;./cache/runescape/class; EGUI
PAUSE[/quote]

Don’t make anything to complicated for youself.

Try this simple one:

@echo off title Nickypie's Runserver. java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server exit

Read full topic
